title: Zalman VE350 - dsk, rmd, ima files not detected

forumNotes.author: Jany
forumNotes.content:
Hello,

Im using Zalman ZM-VE350 (IODD 2531) and i have big problem.

I flashed device with newest official firmware from zalman (2.02), backup utility shows all options active when i connect it.

![W6feYED.png](https://i.imgur.com/W6feYED.png)

I tried to create all types of virtual drives but device wont list them, where is the problem?

When i enter directory with all of files i see "No iso file". Device is using NTFS system (32 menu item limit).

Anybody tried to flash VE350 with IODD firmware?

**Edited by Jany, 12 February 2020 - 12:17 PM.**
